p: The TFC determination revealed similar results to those obtained by other authors [ 35, 40]. Shad et al. obtained lower values for TFC determined in methanol extract of stems (0.8 ± 0.03 mg CE/g d.w.) and leaves (1.00 ± 0.02 mg CE/g d.w.) [ 37]. Higher values of TFC were obtained by Malik et al. on methanol (13.5 ± 0.70 mg RE/g d.w.) and ethanol extracts (8.49 ± 0.08 mg RE/g d.w.) from chicory leaves [ 36].
